GSD.product_version: versions from v4.7 to before v5.10.137
GSD.description:
mtd: maps: Fix refcount leak in of_flash_probe_versatile

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.137 by commit 52ae2b14f76ef2d490337ddc0037bc37125be7b8, it was introduced in version v4.7 by commit b0afd44bc192ff4c0e90a5fc1724350bcfc32b33. For more details please see the references link.
